select new com.jshx.ybqyapbgba.entity.AssRepFil(t.id, t.ratingAgenciesName, t.submitDate, t.completeDate, t.nextRecordDate, t.areaId, t.companyName, t.recordNum, t.recordDate,t.createUserID) from AssRepFil t where t.delFlag = 0
and t.deptId in (:deptCodes)
and t.id in (:ids)
and t.areaId = :areaId
and t.companyName like :companyName
and t.recordNum like :recordNum
and t.recordDate >= :startRecordDate
and t.recordDate <= :endRecordDate
and t.ratingAgenciesName like :ratingAgenciesName
and t.submitDate >= :startSubmitDate
and t.submitDate <= :endSubmitDate
and t.completeDate >= :startCompleteDate
and t.completeDate <= :endCompleteDate
and t.nextRecordDate >= :startNextRecordDate
and t.nextRecordDate <= :endNextRecordDate
and t.createUserID= :createUserId
and charindex(t.companyId,:companmyIds) >0
and t.companyId = :companyId
and ( t.companyName like :searchLike or t.recordNum like :searchLike or t.ratingAgenciesName like :searchLike)
order by t.createTime desc
